Description:
.Structural Design: Lead and participate in the design and analysis of various structures, including buildings, bridges, towers, and other infrastructure projects, ensuring structural integrity, stability, and safety.
Project Management: Oversee and manage projects from inception to completion, including developing project plans, budgets, and schedules. Monitor progress and ensure that projects are delivered within agreed timelines and budget constraints.
Technical Expertise: Utilize your extensive knowledge of structural engineering principles and industry best practices to deliver innovative and efficient design solutions.
Code Compliance: Ensure that all designs adhere to relevant building codes, standards, and regulations, taking into account environmental and seismic considerations.
Quality Assurance: Implement quality control measures to verify the accuracy and completeness of structural drawings, calculations, and documentation.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering or equivalent.
Minimum of 14 years of relevant experience Construction industry with comprehensive experience in Civil/Structural Engineering, associated technologies and facilities.
Should have good experience in material submittals, method statement reviews.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent technical, team-working and interpersonal skills.
Experience and detailed knowledge of relevant international codes and standards. Candidates with previous experience on  projects will be given priority.
Ability to make independent decisions in the planning, organizing and coordination of solutions to complex problems.
Experience as a Lead Engineer for a team of discipline engineers.
We offer an excellent package which includes:

A competitive salary
Transportation allowance
Medical and life insurance cover
26 calendar days annual leave
Medical and life insurance cover
Company gratuity scheme
Discretionary bonus scheme
Annual flight allowance to point of origin
